title: When i received the rp and be on my pbe i didnt get very much
body:
When i received my rp and blue essence i only got 3300 rp and 5 be was i meant to get more?
Thank you

replies.body: [**PBE Stipends changed slightly**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-there-are-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence), which you can read up on in the PBE Boards. You now get about 3000RP and 5BE which will be refilled periodically.
